task.title: Creating a New Account
task.abstract:
Account records provide an overview of activities through the related lists:
Contacts
Sales Orders
Subscriptions
Invoices
Receipts
Payment Methods
Badges Additionally, staff users can sort, filter, and locate specific accounts using standard and custom list views.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Accounts tab in the eBusiness app and click New.

step.info: Best practices recommend selecting the Primary Contact from the lookup. If no Primary Contact is associated to the Account, a Primary Default Contact will autopopulate the field when making account transactions.
If the newly created account is a subsidiary, use the lookup to select the Parent Account.
